description: A tour of U.S. atomic test sites in Nevada, New Mexico, Colorado, Mississippi, and Alaska.
name: Atomic Journeys: Welcome to Ground Zero

original_info.id: Atomic Journeys: Welcome to Ground Zero_2000
original_info.name: Atomic Journeys: Welcome to Ground Zero

review.name: This is a highly recommended video!
review.reviewBody: This is best in DVD! Only get this in DVD! You get so many extra features. The music is great. In DVD you can just hear the music if you want to. There is some great scenes of nuke explosions! For many years our government (U.S. Government) kept this deadly secret from us. Nuclear blasts in our own backyard. It is very shocking that our own government would keep this kind of secret from us, but they have many more secrets then what they are telling us. Any way, this is a great movie. You need to see it. I would highly recommend this video to anyone. But, if you are going to check it out, watch the DVD version.

trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from Visual Concept Entertainment
trailer.name: Atomic Journeys: Welcome To Ground Zero
